column1: Smoque BBQ////i've had a lot of friends tell me that i have to try this place. specifically
column2: i've had a few rave to me about their chili
column3: because i'm a chili junkie. they went on and on about the brisket chili. so
column4: i decided i'd ride shotgun one day to check it out. first off i have to say that the chili totally underwhelmed me to the point that i thought it was just ok. i had expected so much more from all the raves. that being said
column5: i sampled some of the saint louis style ribs (fantastic)
column6: went on to the brisket sandwich (damn good)
column7: and had the mac Â cheese (just about as good as my wife's and that is saying a lot) and fries (tasty) on the side.
